phrs.translation: 自动化设备；自动化装置
过程自动化；工序自动化

sentences.sentence: Automation meant the loss of many factory jobs.
sentences.translation: 自动化意味着许多工厂工人失业。

sentences.sentence: In the last ten years automation has reduced the work force here by half.
sentences.translation: 在过去的10年中，自动化已经减少了这里一半的劳动力。

sentences.sentence: Administrative staff may be deskilled through increased automation and efficiency.
sentences.translation: 随着自动化程度和效率提高，行政人员可能不再需要专业技能。
